issue.title: [CF 1591] Is there a condition that detects the number of mobs near the player?
issue.body:
If not, would it be possible to add this type of condition?  I would like a Spell Cooldown icon to show when the player is <within 5 yards of>  <greater than> one enemy.  For example, Crash Lightning is set to show when near more than one enemy.


> Posted by CurseForge user daemon9 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1591 | Raw
